content: {"name": "Shively Area Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Reach 15mins before the closing time to be served.\nClosed on first Monday of every month.\nClosed on Friday", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4415 Dixie Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Louisville", "state_province": "KY", "postal_code": "40216", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.181848, "longitude": -85.81486}, "phones": [{"number": "(502) 447-4330", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}]}
